column5: English
column11: English

column4: エドゥアール館長＿冷静な顔
次は、こいつに乗ってみろ。
column5: Next, you can try your hand at this one.
column11: Next, you can try your hand at this one.

column4:
/c5人形騎士スレイフ/c3。
３０年前に作られた
人形騎士の傑作じゃ。
column5:
/c5Puppet Knight Sleife/c3.
At the time of its creation 30 years ago, it was a masterpiece.
column11:
/c5Knight Mech Sleife/c3.
It was a masterpiece of it's time when it was created 30 years ago.

column4:
型は古いが、
現代の人形騎士と比べても、
性能はさほど劣らん。
column5: It may be an old model, but its performance isn't far behind some of today's modern Puppet Knights.
column11: It may be an old model, but it's performance is not far behind some of today's modern Knight Mechs.

column5: Are you for real...?
column11: Are you for real...?

column4:
見た目は、かなり
時代遅れな感じだぜ。
column5: Seems pretty outdated by the look of it.
column11: Just from the look of it, it seems pretty outdated.

column4: エドゥアール館長＿自慢げ

column5: Take a closer look at the sword.
column11: Take a closer look at the sword.

column4: 巨大な魔剣ダインスレイフ。
column5: That's the massive demonic blade Dainsleif.
column11: That's the massive demonic blade, Dainsleif.

column4:
剣の破壊力だけは、
輪工房の人形にも負けんぞ。
column5: The only thing that can stand up to the destructive power of that sword is a Puppet of the Wheel Workshop.
column11: The only thing that can stand up to the destructive power of that sword, are the puppets created by the Wheel Workshop.

column4: エドゥアール館長＿基本姿勢

column5: Well then, give it a try.
column11: Anyway, just give it a whirl.

column4:
どうだ、/p？
えらい旧式だけど操縦できるか？
column5:
How is it, /p?
It's stupidly old-fashioned, but do you think you can pilot it?
column11:
How is it, /p?
It's ridiculously old-fashioned, but do you think you can pilot it?

column4: エドゥアール館長＿基本姿勢

こいつは/c5２枚の歯車/c3を
使って動かす。
column5: There are /c5two gears/c3 that control it.
column11: There are /c5two gears/c3 to control it.

column4: 歯車を回してみるんじゃ。
column5: Try rotating the gears.
column11: Try rotating the gears.

column4:
左上の歯車を/c5素早く回す/c3と
剣をふる。
column5: Give the upper-left gear a /c5quick turn/c3 to swing the sword.
column11: Give the upper-left gear a /c5quick turn/c3 to swing the sword.

column4: 歩くのは/c5十字ボタン/c3じゃぞ。
column5: And use the /c5D-Pad/c3 to walk as usual.
column11: And use the /c5D-Pad/c3 to walk as usual.

column4: エドゥアール館長＿ムッとする

column5: Although...
column11: Although...

column4:
歯車は、動かせる限界以上は
回してはいかん。壊れやすい
からな。
column5: You should be careful not to rotate the gears beyond their limits. They're rather fragile.
column11: You should be careful not to rotate the gears beyond their limits. They're only fragile.

column4:
もし壊れてしまったら、/c5スター
トボタン/c3を押して、/c5再出撃/c3を選
択すれば、最初からやり直せる。
column5: If they do break, press the /c5Start Button/c3 to /c5retry/c3 the mission from the beginning.
column11: If they do break, press the /c5start button/c3 to /c5retry/c3 the mission from the beginning.

column5: Sounds awfully unreliable to me.
column11: Sounds awfully flimsy to me.

column4: エドゥアール館長＿大きな驚き

なんと！
あれはオートマン！！
column5:
What!?
It's an Automan!
column11:
What!?
It's an Automan!!

column4:
なんということか！？
こんな場所にまで、
あらわれおった！！
column5:
What's the meaning of this!?
It just appeared out of nowhere!
column11:
What's the meaning of this!?
It just appeared out of nowhere!!

column4:
どうやら、自警団の攻撃で
ダメージを受けてるみたいだ。
凶暴化してるよ。
column5:
Looks like it's been damaged by some vigilantes. 
It's acting aggressive.
column11:
Looks like it's been damaged by some vigilantes. 
It's acting aggressive.

column4: エドゥアール館長＿大きな驚き

闇工房め！
どう始末をつけるつもりか！？
column5:
That ghastly Dark Workshop!
How are we supposed to deal with this!?
column11:
That ghastly Dark Workshop!
How are we supposed to deal with it!?

column5: It's headed this way!
column11: It's headed this way!!

column4: エドゥアール館長＿怒鳴る

いかん！
博物館が潰される！
column5:
Oh no!
It's going to destroy the museum!
column11:
Oh no!
It's going to destroy the museum!

column4:
ここにある人形は人類の宝じゃ。
なんとか守らねば……。
column5: The Puppets here are national treasures. We must do something to protect them...
column11:
The mechs here are national treasures.
We've got to do something to protect them...
